reviews.text: Sooo good üòã

Great Burek, Great desserts and coffe.
Excellent business ran by great family!

Best burek in all of NYC hands down. I can never really find pita and burek with cabbage , leek, or pumpkin, but Dea has all of them.

Perfectly crispy, flaky, not greasy, full of ingredients, and made with love, this food brings me back to my grandmother‚Äôs cooking from my childhood.

Dea Burek is always an essential stop when I‚Äôm in the Bronx. üá¶üá±üáΩüá∞

Burek is okay, flaky, but on a greasier side. Issue is here service. Today woman behind the counter was not hospitable at all. After she told us (in a very arrogant way) that the only choice is sliced burek, we placed the order. Two with cheese and yogurt. After we waited about half an hour (on a Tuesday 3pm  half empty place) we went to check on our order. It was behind the counter, but she didn‚Äôt serve it to us for some reason. Also she said that they are out of trays so burek was given on a paper plate.
Not going back and not recommending this place to anyone.
My first time trying Albanian food, and is simply delicious. I got the meat pie slice and an Albanian soda, Ivi Lemon. Approved!

I‚Äôve never had Albanian/balkan cuisine but I will definitely have more!! Very delicious burek with crispy outside and the ayran was also very tasty. Pretty good for the price, and very small wait time.

The burek is good overall but too much black pepper for my taste, I didn‚Äôt feel comfortable feeding my kid with it.
I will definitely give it another try for different pies. It looks very clean and the staff was very friendly

Dea Burek is a lovely spot, and it‚Äôs especially nice to have the option to sit outdoors in the warmer months. The burek is made fresh‚Äîstraight out of the oven‚Äîand you can truly taste the difference. We had the meat slice and absolutely loved it. We also brought home some cheese burek, and it was a huge hit with the family. Easily one of the best bureks I‚Äôve had in New York.
They definitely don't put enough ingredients in the bureg. I recommend you go to other bureg places in this area.
Burek was okay but greasy and needs more flavor
Had a cheese and meat slice. Both where delicious. Ordered a leak roll. Did not disappoint.
One of the best burek I ever had . 10 out of 10 . Good job üëç
i‚Äôm albanian and i‚Äôm just gonna say this is about the best and most authentic byrek you can get without actually going to albania/kosovo. absolutely delicious! highly recommend
Their food is amazing !!!

Best burek I have had in the US, and even better than some I have had in the Balkan countries. My family had cheese, spinach, and meat filled. They all had adequate fillings and were not greasy.  Not burned, and cooked just right. The service was very good as well. Would love to get more if I lived closer, but it was a stop driving near the Bronx and well worth it.
I thank the business for providing a quality product.

I‚Äôm not afraid to say it: the cabbage burek was the best bite of food we had on our Arthur Ave journey. Do not sleep on the Albanian food on Arthur Ave!!! Run don‚Äôt walk to Dea Burek and definitely try the cabbage - so flakey, crunchy on the outside soft on the side, savory, and just a little bit sweet.
Such a cozy spot. Amazing coffee and very fair prices. Will be coming back!
Great place for Burek. Fresh and tasty. I usually buy five pies for takeout. Once you taste their Burek, you'll never go anywhere else.

First time I went to visit Dea was when my daughter showed me a TikTok video.  The Burek was ok I bought meet pumpkin and potato. Second time I went I realized this is not my type of Burek. The meet looks smashed and sweet. When I brought it home nobody wanted to eat it Big waste of money. For family that knows and been all around Balkan countrys Dea Burek is not the place. Sorry but maybe less grease and more real meet would work better.
The sweetest people with some pretty amazing burek. Worth the drive from NJ to NY, you will definitely not be disappointed!!!
Only Authentic here! Made fresh to order. Took me back‚Ä¶ the leek burek is a MUST. Trust me you won‚Äôt regret it.
Phenomenal burek that made me want to cry after my first bite. You have to come here
I went here to pick up rolls but you have to order those in advance so I got a couple of slices of bureau with cheese & spinach. Parking here is ridiculous!
A gem of a place.

Five minute drive from the nybg. Bae always makes the great choices. This beat my reccomendation for us to get pizza after spending 7 hours at nybg.
The service was exceptional, we had the whole place to ourselves. Desserts are amazing. They had this yogurt drink I put bae onto that is a fond memory of my childhood. I‚Äôm glad he‚Äôs open to trying food from different cultures. Healthy meal too. We will definitely come back. Took some desserts to go to! And the fruit desert you see, comes in a glass dish and they let you take that home after. Five stars all around!

It's an Albania tradition!
Get it with the yogurt. Don't forget desert! Came with bae after the NYBG. Five start experience.
Dessert so good we had to take home to mom! You have to try it!!
Amazing quality bureks they have
<3 their cheese and spinach burek.
Lugar excelente, sus pasteles de carne son deliciosos y sus precios son muy buenos. El mejor local relaci√≥n calidad-precio. Seguro que repetiremos!
The best Burek
This is the best Burek place in New York!
Amazing burek and amazing homemade yogurt!
My mom found Dea Burek after a lot of research and we drove in from NJ just to give Dea‚Äôs burek a taste. The verdict is in: Tastes just like the burek my grandmother used to make.
Spinach burek and triple chocolate dessert cup was yummy! üòã
Best byrek in New York
Delicious food. Order the Burek roll in advance by calling as it takes 15-20 minutes. Super clean, attentive staff
best burek ever!
Best byrek in NY
Fresh Burek.
This was the best part of our trip. They were so friendly and kind. We never been to Albanian spot and wanted to try a few items and they were so thoughtful and great. Definitely will go back.
First time trying out Burek and I loved it, especially the cheese one
If you wanna try Albanian food I recommend you to try the best burek in the world by the best person who makes the best burek in new york you must try it thank me later
Love your burek feels like back home you guys are the best and make everyone happy
The best burek in New York no question asked definitely a 5 star üåü

Very pleasant experience with amazing service and delicious Spinach Pie and Latte.

Definitely going back again.

Exellenent burke with exception they
Dont have them ready so you have to wait 15 minutes it's an inconvenience when in a hurry or cannot find parking‚Ä¶
Fresh, delicious burek. Best i had in new york metro area.
Easily the best burek ever even better than What you get in Albania
Hands down the best burek you can get.

A place that specializes in bureks! They have a lot more flavors to choose from than most restaurants that offer bureks. We got the potato, leek, and pumpkin rolls. They were baked fresh and came out steamy hot and delicious.
Would love to come back to try the dessert.

New to Arthur ave/ little Italy , family Buisness, inside and outside seating, if you like Burek ..this is the place for you. Got there as they where closing and they where nice enough to make a meat and spinach pie to go. I will be coming back to dine in. üëçüëç
You won't be disappointed with their Burek. 10/10- definitely recommended place.
A tasty meat burek followed by a strong cappuccino made for a delicious lunch.
I ordered potato burek and delivery was very fast and perfectly packed . Potato pie tasted like ‚Äú grandma‚Äôs burek‚Äù - so authentic . You guys are the best !!

I‚Äôve been here a few times, and i really love the staff and the food there, everything is so good and can‚Äôt wait to come by again sometime. Keep going with the good work that you got there!! And thank you for the way you guys deal with the‚Ä¶

Food and the ambiance is great, but the customer service is not. The girls are not very welcoming and with a sort of attitude every time i went there. Food sometimes they say 15 minutes but it takes 25 which is a lot. Other than these issues, the food is tasty and nice.
Stopped by out of curiosity and bought 2 slices of pie, one meat and one spinach. Great quality and price, will definitely stop by again sometime.

Great customer service! i was very pleased with all the employees, they are all very nice and friendly! The food is amazing, this place never fails to amaze me. I highly recommend everyone to go and try this place, you wont be disappointed!
Excellent coffee. Pastry was very tasty. Made with love.
Great coffee and great food service was awesome.. keep up the good work.!!
